question: Can I use "Apple Cider Vinegar" that has written "Kosher" on the label ?
answer:
QUESTION
I get an uneasiness when I intend to use it. Additionally, written on the label is "Aged in Wood".I get the feeling that is has alcohol.
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to consume Apple Cider vinegar.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
